Hey! I'm Erin Gunn

I am the sole member of Ikonic Games. I manage everything from development and design to business and marketing. My goal is to build a sustainable business making HTML5 and crossplatform video games. Currently, I am focussing solely on the HTML5 side of the business.

When I am not making video games, you can find me travelling South America with my girlfriend, surfing, climbing, whitewater kayaking, or just about any activity that has the potential to maim me. I like to live my life as if I have a reset button.

Thank you for checking out my site and enjoy my games!

Blurb

Ikonic Games (@IkonicGames) is a one-man game development 'studio', currently based somewhere in South America that I can find internet. I like making games that everyone can play and nobody wants to put down.
